## Description {#details}

Analyses memory accesses in a loop.

Checks whether run time pointer checks are needed and builds sets for data dependence checking.

Definition at line 638 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp">LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp</a>.

### canCheckPtrAtRT() {#a60735e0d022845d03d123916bb48e1e8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AccessAnalysis::canCheckPtrAtRT (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimepointerchecking">RuntimePointerChecking</a> &amp; RtCheck, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42; SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; TheLoop, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Strides, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;&amp; UncomputablePtr, bool ShouldCheckWrap=false)</>}>
Check whether we can check the pointers at runtime for non-intersection.

Returns true if we need no check or if we do and we can generate them (i.e. the pointers have computable bounds).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#l00689">689</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp">LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createCheckForAccess() {#add290ed56a35aadf648ebccf66491f0f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AccessAnalysis::createCheckForAccess (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimepointerchecking">RuntimePointerChecking</a> &amp; RtCheck, <a href="#a0c684eecabc9183add9e1028170460ca">MemAccessInfo</a> Access, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; AccessTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Strides, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, unsigned &gt; &amp; DepSetId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; TheLoop, unsigned &amp; RunningDepId, unsigned ASId, bool ShouldCheckStride, bool Assume)</>}>
Check if we can emit a run-time no-alias check for <code>Access</code>.

Returns true if we can emit a run-time no alias check for <code>Access</code>. If we can check this access, this also adds it to a dependence set and adds a run-time to check for it to <code>RtCheck</code>. If <code>Assume</code> is true, we will attempt to use additional run-time checks in order to get the bounds of the pointer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#l00677">677</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp">LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isDependencyCheckNeeded() {#a77116c2c948f7f69de875c120e505c59}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp&#125;::AccessAnalysis::isDependencyCheckNeeded () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Initial processing of memory accesses determined that we need to perform dependency checking.

Note that this can later be cleared if we retry memcheck analysis without dependency checking (i.e. FoundNonConstantDistanceDependence).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#l00704">704</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp">LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp</a>.

### IsRTCheckAnalysisNeeded {#a475f0854510e3ff5d75bee0790263a83}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp&#125;::AccessAnalysis::IsRTCheckAnalysisNeeded = false</>}>
Initial processing of memory accesses determined that we may need to add memchecks.

Perform the analysis to determine the necessary checks.

Note that, this is different from isDependencyCheckNeeded. When we retry memcheck analysis without dependency checking (i.e. FoundNonConstantDistanceDependence), isDependencyCheckNeeded is cleared while this remains set if we have potentially dependent accesses.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp/#l00782">782</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopaccessanalysis-cpp">LoopAccessAnalysis.cpp</a>.
